eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 07:26 AM ON SEP 22, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:25 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Silver Alert has been issued for Phoenix, Arizona. Phoenix Police Department is looking for Liberty Nicole Salazar, Native American female, 23 years old, 5 feet 3 inches tall, 130 pounds, with brown hair and brown eyes. Liberty was last seen on Thursday, 9/18/2025, in the area of North 4th Street and East Taro Lane on foot. Liberty was last seen wearing a black shirt, black leggings and white Converse shoes. Liberty suffers a medical condition which without prescribed medication she may become disoriented and easily lost. Please contact the Phoenix Police Department with any information regarding Liberty. If you have contact with this Silver Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
